description: Try our easy to follow Easy Salmon recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cheesecake,Pescatarian,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Salmon
name: Easy Salmon Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cm piece fresh ginger, finely grated
0.5 small red onion, coarsely grated and drained on paper towel
3 tbs fresh continental parsley, chopped (save 1 tbs for tartare)
5ml virgin olive oil spray, for greasing

recipeInstructions.text: Finely dice the salmon and add to a large bowl with onion, ginger, parsley, mayonnaise and lemon juice. Season. Form 1/4 cups of mixture into patties. Place onto a tray, refrigerate for 15 minutes if time permits.
Spray a large non-stick frying pan with oil. Heat over a medium-low heat. Cook patties in batches, for 2 minutes each side or until cooked through and golden.
For the quick tartare, combine mayonnaise, gherkins, lemon juice and parsley in a medium bowl. Season.

Serve patties with quick tartare. Tip 1: Spray measuring cup with spray oil, so that the salmon mixture doesnâ€™t stick. Tip 2: Swap quick tartare with Woolworths Gold curry mayonnaise for a different flavour. Tip 3: These patties make great salmon burgers topped with salad leaves and cucumber.
